USE datasciencegp052024;
GO;

DROP VIEW business.ProductCategory
GO
--Table Type: Catalogo
CREATE VIEW business.ProductCategory 
AS
 SELECT 
 * from
 OPENROWSET (
 BULK 'https://stdatasciencetf01.blob.core.windows.net/silver/data/Detalle_Embarque',
 FORMAT ='PARQUET'
 ) as [r];
GO

---CREATE TABLA EXTERNAL

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE business.sat_clientes
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.sat_clientes(
    cod_cliente NVARCHAR(10),
    nombre_cliente NVARCHAR(50)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/silver/data/Detalle_Cliente',
    DATA_SOURCE = UPExternalDataSource1,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

SELECT * FROM business.sat_clientes
GO
